DataTransferItemType.summary:
The read-only DataTransferItem.type property returns the
type (format) of the object representing the drag data
item. The type is a Unicode string generally given by a MIME type, although
a MIME type is not required.

remarks.para: Some example types are: text/plain and text/html.

DataTransferItemType.value: A string representing the drag data item's type.
